attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the government to stop building mosques in Britain.

Mosques do not fit in with the landscape of Britain.Money spent on mosques for the needs of one minority could be better spent on the NHS and Schools for the benefit of everybody.Spending millions on building Mosques will only cause more racial divide in Britain and it will force even more people to the far right.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
